about_the_game:
Help Kip run, jump, shoot, swim, and fly her way through the galaxy to save her kidnapped Cat Odosan in this hand-crafted precision platforming mashup. Enjoy 12 unique levels of platforming challenges through a variety of game play types and unique worlds, all the while piecing together the mystery of who Kip and Odosan really are, and the danger they face.

Play as both Kip and Odosan, each with their unique abilities, and piece together the mystery of who Kip and Odosan really are, and the danger they face.

About the Game:

  • A single player adventure with beautiful hand drawn worlds, unique enemies, and an all original music soundtrack.
  • Play as both Kip and Odosan, each with unique abilities along with fun variety in game play, mechanics, and power ups. Levels range from standard platforming, to run n gun, chase levels, boss fights, hard core platforming, side shooter, and staged boss battles.
  • A comic book approach to story that offers twists and turns along the way and changing mechanics.
  • Complete with collectibles, speed/timing, and death counts.
  • The controls are kept simple and the game play intuitive. Explore, learn, and master as you play! Every death, every failure, brings you closer to solving the mystery, and re-uniting Kip and Odosan at last, and maybe saving the galaxy along the way!

Supports both Keyboard and Controller player. For controller support the Generic Gamepad template is recommended. Keyboard support includes:
  • Movement: Arrow Keys, Z = Jump, V = Shoot (Z = A Button, X = B Button)
  • Movement: WASD, U = Jump, P = Shoot (U = A Button, I = B Button)
  • Escape, Space Bar to pause or exit game from Menu

highlighted.name: Reunited, and it feels so good!

name: Kip and Odosan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core 2.4 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Help Kip run, jump, shoot, swim, and fly her way through the galaxy to save her kidnapped Cat Odosan in this hand-crafted precision platformer. Explore 12 unique levels of platforming challenges through a variety of game play types and unique and challenging levels.
